00024 #include <string>
00025 #include <vector>

00027 namespace indri 
00028 {
00029   namespace infnet 
00030   {
00031     
00032     class EvaluatorNode : public InferenceNetworkNode {
00033     public:
00034       typedef std::map< std::string, std::vector<indri::api::ScoredExtentResult> > MResults;
00035 
00036       virtual ~EvaluatorNode() {};
00037 
00038       // Called once for every document ID returned by nextCandidateDocument().
00039       // May be called for documents other than those returned by nextCandidateDocument().
00040       virtual void evaluate( lemur::api::DOCID_T documentID, int documentLength ) = 0;
00041       virtual const MResults& getResults() = 0;
00042     };
00043   }
00044 }
